general.title: Vampire Party
error: Oops! Something went wrong. It's probably your fault. Don't blame this on me!

waitingRoom.name: Name
waitingRoom.welcomeText: Welcome {playerName}, you're now in the *spooky* waiting room #{gameSessionId}. Chill out and relax while everyone else joins.... if you can... hahahhaha
waitingRoom.vipWelcomeText: {playerName}, as the first play to join room #{gameSessionId} you have special responsibilities.  Once more than four players have joined you can start the game.

intro.title: Introduction to game
content: Please look at the Desktop app (if you can't see it, check that the video chat is visible and ask the host to share their screen)

description.Vampire: You are at the top of the food chain. Each night, the Vampires can select one non-vampire to suck their blood - but if there are multiple vampires, you must be in agreement to kill
description.Cullen: A sneaky vampire, who has perfected their act of deception as a human in  main-stream society for the last century and feasts only on innocent animals and carrots.  If the Garlic Farmer chooses to gift The Cullen garlic, The Cullen will be outed as a Vampire
description.Garlic Farmer: A friendly farmer who has taken over their family garlic farm, which has been in operation since 1696. While other townspeople discount them as a crackpot old fool, the Farmer knows well the lore of the Vampire, and is devoted to protecting the town with his crop.
description.Human Person: This is a placeholder for future more interesting characters.
description.Librarian: Librarian has so many books rich with town history, including records of paranormal and supernatural events. Giles loves his books, and his books love him, and will reward him useful information about vampiric identities.

default.Cullen: You brood silently... awaiting the sparkling daylight
default.Priest: You contemplate damnation... knowing hellish creatures are on the loose
default.Human Person: Scary times... there are beasts on the loose....(update flavor text)
default.Mayor: Beasts are on the loose... look busy!(update flavor)

vampireVote.instructions: As a vampire... you may select your next victim
vampireVote.voted: The hunt is on. (add flavor text)
vampireVote.agreeOnVote: All vampires must be in agreement in order to begin the hunt

garlicVote.instructions: As the garlic farmer you get choose who to give garlic to. But remember you can only give each player one garlic per game.
garlicVote.voted: You've given a head of garlic to {name}.

default.Cullen: How is it possible that the sun was rising in the middle of my midnight?(TODO: re-write in prod, as stolen from twilight)
default.Garlic Farmer: Time to plant those crops... by that I mean garlic
default.Human Person: Morning sunshine!  Drink some coffee... stretch your legs...
default.Librarian: You wake up... it's morning. cool. You're a goddamned librarian.
default.Mayor: Mayors rule the school, it's cool.  Morning fool!

priestVote.voted: You've chosen to resurrect {name}... this is a long and arduous process...

mayorVote.voted: Your votes today count for two... but nobody knows!

notHunted.self: You slept well... with the knowledge that you protected yourself.
notHunted.Garlic Farmer: You find some garlic on your front steps... and you didn't put it there! Farmers stick together
notHunted.Priest: You find some garlic on your front steps... It's a miracle!
notHunted.Human Person: You find some garlic on your front steps...
notHunted.Librarian: You find some garlic on your front steps...You've ready about this practice and are grateful
notHunted.Mayor: You find some garlic on your front steps... some offering!
notHunted.Vampire: You were given garlic...which makes you ill... No hunting for you!

hunted.self: You are pleased you put garlic out front, as there are scratch marks on your front door
hunted.Garlic Farmer: You find scratch marks are your front steps... thank goodness for the kindness of your fellow farmer!
hunted.Priest: Bless the garlic farmer!  His garlic tithe was your saving grace - you find scratch marks out front
hunted.Human Person: You find some garlic on your front steps... and scratch marks at the door
hunted.Librarian: You find some garlic on your front steps...You've ready about this practice and are grateful - and are thankful as there are scratches at the door
hunted.Mayor: You find some garlic on your front steps... and scratch marks at the door

garlicUpdates.fuckedOver: The garlic farmer fucked you over... you went to pay a visit to {name}, and there was garlic there...(todo: make PG)
garlicUpdates.gaveToFellowVamp: A member of your vampire crew was given garlic.  No hunting tonight....

resurrectionUpdates.prompt: Last night {name} was bitten... would you like to use your priestly powers to help them?

playerResurrected.Garlic Farmer: You've been given a second chance at life!  The priest has resurrected you!
playerResurrected.Priest: You've been given a second chance at life!  The priest has resurrected you!
playerResurrected.Human Person: You've been given a second chance at life!  The priest has resurrected you!
playerResurrected.Librarian: You've been given a second chance at life!  The priest has resurrected you!
playerResurrected.Mayor: You've been given a second chance at life!  The priest has resurrected you!

alreadyUsedSuperPower.nobodyDied: You've already used your priestly powers... luckily nobody died

mayoralUpdates.prompt: As the wiley politician you may choose to vote twice... but you'll have to plan ahead.  This can only be done once!
mayoralUpdates.alreadyUsedSuperPower: You've used your ace in the hole... But that but you are still a politician at heart.  Use that!

default.Vampire: Time to vote on who dies next... keep a low profile!
default.Cullen: It's time for mob mobility! Grab your pitchforks, decide who must be staked next!

firstNight.title: Night
firstNight.content: Hello and welcome. I hope your beds are comfortable and your doors are locked. Because there are 2 Vampires afoot, and they are huuuuuungry. Vampires are not the only ones who are active at night though, so pay attention to your screen for any prompts. Hope to see you all in the AM!

night.title: Night
night.content: It is night time... the beasts are about... they will choose their prey. There is little that can help you now... Look at your phone even if you are not the vampire... if you act quick enough maybe you can avoid death...

morning.title: Morning
nothingHappened: It was a nice evening.  Nobody is dead.  Weird.
vampireKilled: During the early hours the limp bloodless body of {murderedPlayer} was discovered
playerResurrected: It's a miracle!  During the night {name} was resurrected

day.title: Day
day.content: It's a cloudy day... but at least it's light out.

Vampire: A pile of ashes was found where {victimName} was staked through the heart... looks like there is one vampire less in the mix?
Cullen: A pile of ashes was found where {victimName} was staked through the heart... looks like there is one vampire less in the mix?
Garlic Farmer: {victimName} the {victimRole} was staked through the heart last night.  Goes to show bad breadth can kill you...
Priest: {victimName} the {victimRole} was staked through the heart last night
Mayor: {victimName} the {victimRole} was staked through the heart last night.  Don't feel so important now... do you Mr. Mayor!
Librarian: {victimName} the {victimRole} was staked through the heart last night.  Goes to show... reading is dead.
Human Person: {victimName} the {victimRole} was staked through the heart last night

pollResults.onlyTwoPlayersLeft: This was the final showdown... It doesn't look promising for the the last person standing
pollResults.noTriesLeft: No one is dying today.  It's almost as if someone  or something... is trying to thwart your attempts, and create disagreement within your group
pollResults.oneTryLeft: You have one more try to determine who to stake.
pollResults.twoTriesLeft: If you can't... agree nobody dies.. you have two tries left
